message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product. It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. However, $150 is a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $85 for the product.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand that $150 is a bit high for you, but $85 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer you the product for $115. It's a fair price that I think you'll find reasonable.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $115 is still a bit too high.  I'm willing to pay $95 for the product, and I think that's a fair compromise. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but $95 is still below my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll offer you the product for $110. I think this is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.
